hooks.command: filepath=$(echo "$CLAUDE_TOOL_INPUT" | jq -r '.file_path // empty'); if [ -n "$filepath" ] && echo "$filepath" | grep -qE 'db/migration/V[0-9]+__'; then echo 'BLOCK: Do not edit applied Flyway migrations. Create a new V{N+1}__ migration file instead.' >&2; exit 2; fi

filepath=$(echo "$CLAUDE_TOOL_INPUT" | jq -r '.file_path // empty'); module=$(echo "$filepath" | grep -oP '(core-domain|infra-db|infra-storage|infra-queue|app-api|app-worker)' | head -1); if [ -n "$module" ] && echo "$filepath" | grep -qE '\.kt$'; then ./gradlew :$module:compileKotlin --quiet 2>&1 | tail -5; fi
